entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9, Android: AOT compiler currently fails with an assertion #94880
    9.0.0
  • Obtaining a Span<Base> out of an array of Derived reference type #94874
  • Improve Unix Console.WriteLine by borrowing from PowerShell's ReadLineFromConsole #94860
  • Asserts in ILLink analyzer #94858
  • SIGSEGV in System.Numerics.Vectors #94856
    9.0.0
  • AES-GCM is supported for `net8.0` TFM but not for `net8.0-maccatalyst` TFM #94848
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected NullReferenceException when running application on Linux #94847
  • GcMemoryInfo returns incorrect values in .NET 8 on macOS 14 Sonoma #94846
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE for SslStream on Windows #94843
    Future
  • [.NET 8][iOS] AOT compiler exited with code 134 #94841
    8.0.x
  • LibraryImport generator can't generate correct syntax for ref struct #94840
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binder generator creates namespace ambiguity error #94836
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Possibility to check if a return value needs to be disposed. #94832
  • [.NET 8] <PublishTrimmed> no longers works but throws build process for an infinite loop #94831
    8.0.x
  • Type.GetType of invalid type fails AOT compilation #94830
  • HTTP client metrics: url.scheme should be opt-in, server.port should be required #94829
  • [8.0] Failing to build native components #94823
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #94821
  • [wasm] Unhandled `System.PlatformNotSupportedException` for crypto tests #94820

Closed

  • CS0122: 'ProblemDetailsJsonConverter' is inaccessible due to its protection level in code generated by System.Tex.Json.SourceGenerator #94862
  • Incorrect SYSLIB1102 error #94826
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 JsonArray.Add throws System.InvalidOperationException: "The element cannot be an object or array." #94842
    8.0.x
  • cannot import X509Certificate from file in .net core 2.0 #23763
    Future
  • DateTime.ParseExact - message text in FormatException does not include string argument #94837
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle failing in CI #89842
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64 [Load/Store]Vector64 and [Load/Store]Vector128 for 2,3 and 4 variants #84510
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #76478
    9.0.0
  • console redirection is broken #22314
    9.0.0
  • .NET on wasm has HttpClient issues on small screens #92999
    8.0.0
  • ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled failing with NativeAOT #74620
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT completely broken on 8.0 branch #93900
  • ILC and ILLink don't respect TrimmerSingleWarn in some cases #94799
  • VS 17.8 MS testhost.exe crashing on .NET 8 with Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #94770
  • [Mono] Enable more WASM AOT tests to run with WASMStripIL=true #90233
    9.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress is not called when SIGQUIT is received #64969
    Future
  • [wasi] Native crash in `System.Collections.Tests` - `out of bounds memory access` #82043
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with an assertion, and `System.BadImageFormatException : Bad method token 0x1b00008f` #81736
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - windows failures #82515
    Future
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with `lock-free-alloc.c:374, condition 'next < LOCK_FREE_ALLOC_SB_USABLE_SIZE (desc->block_size) / desc->slot_size' not met` #81911
    9.0.0
  • SA1021: Negative sign should be preceded by a space #94827
  • Assertion failed '(fgPgoSource != ICorJitInfo::PgoSource::Dynamic) && "Unexpected stale profile in dynamic PGO data"' #94822

PullRequests

Created

  • Update windows queue to vs2022preview #94886
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix cross-block local assertion prop bug; add range enable #94885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version" #94878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't put any modifiers after ref #94875
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update HttpClientBuilderExtensions.cs #94869
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ;$(NetCoreAppPrevious) to src/Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.… #94867
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94865
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SslStream test keylogfile creation #94859
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94857
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread #94855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix a typo in jitconfigvalues.h comment #94849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Count16BitElements() intrinsic for SVE #94845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle platform not supported during test discovery. #94844
    area-System.Security
  • Disallow arrays of System.Void #94835
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtables for EEClassHash and InstMethodHashTable #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Control flow refactor for `TryMoveNext` in `CompositeFormat` #94824
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94854
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix the configuration source gen diagnostic message #94881
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Downgrade 6 & 7 per tactics #94863
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94747
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #94817
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.26
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #94818
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.15
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #94819
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94798
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Remove exclusion for a test that seems to work #94756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • bump-chrome-version.yml: don't run on forks #94834
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix build issues with clang18 #94782
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix format.sh script and remove dotnet-format tool from dotnet-tools.json #94839
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable disabled HTTP3 ALPN check #94838
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #94746
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix declaration of DiagAddNewRegion #94759
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Improve mono_aot_can_specialize (). #94642
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Update official windows queue to vs preview to match public #94887
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed setting ReadMode to Message for NamedPipeClientStream on Windows #94742
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable dprintf logging for the whole GC #94816
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94748
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the overwritten of reg21 when `pLookup->sizeOffset >2047` #94766
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Extract common CodeAnalysis rules into separate file #94696
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix the roslyn build script #2422
  • Add measurement of async2 logic with Execution and SynchronizationContext capture/restore #2421

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nov 23 #2419

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update dotnet watch to support running .NET Aspire AppHost projects #36971
  • React template for 8.0 seems to be missing #36969
  • Worker projects published as a web project #36968
  • IIS Express project fails to build with error "Reference to type 'IPEndPoint' claims it is defined in 'System.Net.Primitives', but it could not be found" #36967
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not add VersionInformation to generated XmlSerializers.dll file #36964
  • NETSDK1204 error during dotnet clean on macOS when AoT enabled #36960
  • Instructions for installing the SDK for macOS through the command line are incorrect #36949

Closed

  • `dotnet tool restore` installing wrong version specified in `dotnet-tools.json` #36434
  • .NET 8: `dotnet list` looks for Nuget.Config file in .csproj file path #36945

PullRequests

Created

  • Target NetStandard2.1 in BrowserRefresh #36981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Don't overwrite user-provided ContainerUser values #36974
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36973
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #36882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Allow ref extension methods for unconstrained generic types #7696

Closed

  • Open issue: evaluation of implicit indexers in object initializers #7684
  • Open issue: nullability analysis of collection expressions #7626
  • Open issues for collection literals #7085
  • Open issues for collection expression construction #7542
  • Champion "Permit IEnumerable<T> as the type of a params parameter" #179
    Backlog
  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use primary constructor (IDE0290) ignores side effects #70868
    Backlog
  • `await` completion in C# `void` method doesn't change `void` to `Task` when adding `async` #70866
  • Consider an alternative representation for binary expressions in the syntax model #70865
  • IDE0251: Triggering On Readonly Property's Init Accessor #70864
  • EnC workspace does not report on generators diagnostics #70863
  • We should consider completing transformations for ```BoundAttribute``` arguments in "success" mode when the only failure reason is accessibility of attribute's constructor. #70861
  • Source Generators: Allow more than one subfolder for hintnames #70859
  • The ```Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.VisualStudioMSBuildWorkspaceTests.TestOpenProject_WithInvalidProjectReference_SkipFalse_Fails``` unit-test started failing locally for .NET Core #70858
  • Roslyn generates corrupt assembly with 65535 (0xFFFF) fields - BadImageFormatException (0x8013110E) #70857
    17.9
  • Unexpected CS8602 generated in local function after update to VS 17.8 #70856
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown from FindSymbols.FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #70850

Closed

  • IntelliSense does not suggest anything when inside a collection expression #70760
  • Complete Word fails in collection expression #70677
  • MSBuildProjectShouldHandleCodePageProperty fails locally #70809
  • Copy and Paste with double quotes is inserting backslash #68414
  • False positive with collection initializers `IDE0028` #70854
  • Inconsistent capitalisation of "Remove Unnecessary Usings" in lightbulb menu #67328
    17.10
  • Exception in CompletionProvider takes down IntelliSense #70786
    Backlog
  • CSharpSpellCheckCodeFixProvider encountered an error in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.9.0 Preview 1.0 #70830

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix use-primary-constructor in the presence of side-effects on the parameters. #70871
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'make struct member readonly' with init accessors. #70869
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change inline rename control's color when format map change #70853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run .NET Core MSBuildWorkspace tests on machines with VS installed #70849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move to .NET 8 RTM #70846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to using spans when doing SourceText.ContentEquals #70839
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid sync-over-async blocking in syntactic classifier #70862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use dnceng connection in darc lab #70867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Change ImmutableDictionary to Dictionary in AnalyzerManager #70852
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace test condition #70848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Two LSIF tool fixes #70847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable IntelliSense for collection expressions #70763
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 (copy runtime logic) #70808
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Wrap calls to CompletionProvider extensions such that they go through our extension manager #70843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move some IOperation helpers from LocalRewriter to CSharpOperationFactory #70860
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race in AsyncLazy where we might not return a single result #70820
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround vscode bug with returning defaultBehavior from prepareRename #70840
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove usage of SyntaxWalker and mark it as banned in roslyn #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2317474 #70726
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User Claims missing from Identity Endpoints breaks Authorization #52142
  • Buttons must have discernible text #52141
  • Cannot build docker app after upgrade to .NET 8 (with blazor) #52140
  • Blazor: NavigationManager - NavigateTo bug with parameters #52138
  • JWT Authentication Error: Bearer error="invalid_token" #52137
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #52136
  • Perf improvement: json #52135
  • Incorrect child component content is rendered with static SSR or prerendering on server #52131
  • RenderMode not working with razor class libraries #52129
  • SwaggerUI broken by primitive return values + endpoint filters #52128
  • DOMException: Failed to execute 'setStartBefore' on 'Range': the given Node has no parent. #52126
  • Page reload in Maui Hybrid Blazor app causes unhandled exception #52119
  • Race condition in JSRuntime on cancellation #52117
  • RouteHandlerAnalyzer throwing exception. #52114
  • Milestones - Inconsistencies #52113
  • error ASP0023: Route '[action]' conflicts with another action route #52110
  • Blazor Web App Run Error when project name contain Chinese #52109
    8.0.x

Closed

  • "dotnet new grpc" doesn't build on a macbook pro m3 #52132
  • [.NET 8] ASP.NET Core Web API Server is Not Accessible in Docker #52059
  • Blazor.web.js broke since official .NET 8 #52074
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, endpoint #52097
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52112
  • [Blazor .NET 8] The same component instance rendered in different pages when using interactive mode #52102
    Planning: WebUI
  • Error Form Submission in asp.net Core MVC #51644
  • OutputCacheMiddleware changes a response behavior of failed bindings issues #51050
    8.0.0
  • enhance interactiveAuto renderMode #52127
  • .NET 8 - Angular + ASP.NET Core template, deleting .vscode folder bugs out the deploy #52116
  • ASP.NET Core and hosting bundles need success blocker #33819
    3.1.x
  • IFormFile incompatible with FromForm in Minimal APIs for .NET 8 Preview 6 #49526
    8.0-rc2
  • Cannot resolve symbol 'RenderModeInteractiveServer' #52048
  • protected override void OnInitialized() firing twice #52111
  • Create default `IdentityErrorDescriber` for some languages #5724
    Backlog
  • Guidance on using Azure AD authentication with Blazor web app #52122
  • <script>-tag in Razor pages ignored for Blazor WebAssembly .NET 7 projects (.NET 8 works though) #52073
  • Analyzer: ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using [action] #52066
  • .NET 8 : dockerfile not working #52092
  • Existing Blazor WASM app fails to build with Visual Studio 17.8.0 #52107
  • TypeError: Failed to fetch in Blazor .net 8.0 with InteractiveAuto #51857
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException #51927

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] do not enhance form when method = "dialog" or target != "_self" #52133
    area-blazor
  • Fallback to ArrayPool in Kestrel #52106
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix the `::after` root component element selector #52105
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Update milestones for December #52134
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #52130
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, analyzer, area-minimal, 8.0.1
  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix Blazor error UI CSS, making the dismiss button visible #50846
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Update CODEOWNERS #52108
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #52034
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #52035
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DEP0700 error when starting Maui Blazor Hybrid app without capability "runFullTrust" #18816
  • [.NET 8, Android] Button ripple effect not working #18815
  • "DEP0600: Deployment failed. Exception - The stub received bad data." if the project name has at least 35 characters #18814
  • Runtime error when using class library with render modes #18812
  • ListView rendering on Mac Catalyst is wrong #18811
  • Flyout behavior difference on iOS when using custom view #18809
  • .NET 8 MAUI Ignores Button.CornerRadius = '0' on Android device #18807
    .NET 8 SR3
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening #18806
  • Exception on Focus command of SKCanvasView #18805
  • [Android] Entry clear button requires tap to the right of appearance #18803
  • Aspire integration for service discovery #18802
  • [Testing] Test results no being pushed #18799
  • Datepicker focus and unfocus event not firing on android #18797
  • Items in a Listview header don't receive gesture events #18793
  • [Enhancement] Add IsVisible to MenuItem #18792
  • While using WebView in Xamarin forms, when user taps on print in website, saving in pdf is not happening. But when used this site in browser, saving in pdf is working fine. #18791
  • [Windows] When the DPI is adjusted to non-100%, drawing strings with GraphicsView creates jitter #18783
  • There's no provision for Alt Key Menu Bar Item activation. Keyboard Accelerators are defined at the MenuFlyoutItem level. #18782
  • For Accessbility, the Narrator not reading Label text which appears on Entry text changed #18781
  • FlexLayouts and ScrollViews cause unhandled InvalidOperationException in WinRT.Runtime.dll with message "Element not found" #18780
  • For Accessibility, the narrator not reading text with different culture in Widows #18779
  • iOS ScrollView stops working when keyboard is open #18776

Closed

  • .NET 8 MAUI Toolbar Transparency and Disappearance Issue #18764
  • .NET 8 - No reference to MauiUIApplicationDelegate and ViewRenderer<,> #18795
  • Hot Reload Doesn't work if another control references it #10506
    Backlog
  • MAUI for .net 6 does not work anymore after updating new VisualStudio 2022|.Net8 #18790
  • Not possible to use the decimal comma on the numeric keyboard in Android. #7582
    Backlog
  • [Testing] MauiCarouselRecyclerView occasionally fails when running Controls Device Tests #18733
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D12 #18675
    .NET 8 SR1
  • I can't to build my first MAUI App (by Microsoft manual) #18801
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D11 #18673
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D14 #18706
    .NET 8 SR1
  • ScrollView layout breaks if child controls IsVisible starts as false #18542
  • ListViewRenderer in Android crash the App #18778
  • .NET 7: Can't add a ListView to a grid position if the column's with is "auto" #18563
  • Events should be triggered on iOS #18582
  • ApplicationVersion parameter to dotnet build no longer works #14524
  • Unable to debug iOS MAUI app #15065
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #15381
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 MAUI project fails to build for Android in the command line as it's unable to detect the Android SDK path #16091
  • Maui 8 preview 6 Blank app iOS using windows host attached to physyical device cannot find part of MauiInfo.plist #16117
  • MAUI application shows the telemetry log as XAMARIN APP #18124
  • Sometimes Crash when using Maui Essentials Send Email #18181
  • Error - "Android" system image is incomplete #18629

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Address CollectionView virtualization #18813
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `WebView` #18810
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Add CollectionView UITests #18798
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C2 #18794
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.113 to 7.0.114 #18789
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary `SELECT` wrapper around executed SQL #32327
  • LINQ "Contains" generates SQL with wrong char length #32325
  • add migrations in EF core 6 or 7 remove annotation on primary key #32324
  • NavigationExpandingExpressionVisitor IndexOutOfRangeException #32323
  • EntityTypeAttributeConventionBase disappearance from EF7 to EF8 #32322
  • EFC 8.0: Precompiled model: Error CS0041 Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.'  #32321
  • Include() on owned types does not work when placed after Where() #32320
  • One or more errors occurred. (Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #32318
  • I suggest a better way to work with Stored Procedure migrations #32316
  • Create and publish Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Specification.Tests #32315

Closed

  • TexdateYesApp #32326

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32217 - Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument (and possibly other non-lambda arguments) #32317
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mariner 1 and Mariner 2 runtime-deps rpm package dependencies (x86_64 and aarch64) need to include ca-certificates #17820
  • Cannot get the latest .Net 9.0 SDK build from the Table, downloaded version doesn't match the display version. #17814

PullRequests

Created

  • Download and compare linux-musl-x64 MSFT sdk #17823
  • Use .NET 9 SDK for previously source-built SDK #17822
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17817

Merged

  • Use unique non-stable SDK version for comparison test #17819
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Downgrade implicit version #17762
  • Consume portable RID graph from runtime #17760
  • Update .NET 8 GA MAUI baseline manifests #17794

Updated

  • Fix the minimum version logic to take into account that we're off-by-one for the 100 release #17761
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #17771
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #17785
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17800
  • Update Aspire baseline manifest version #17809
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17806
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17802
